sn23.12:1.2: Seated to one side, Venerable Radha said to the Buddha:
sn23.12:1.3: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘susceptible to Mara’.
sn23.12:1.5: “Radha, form is susceptible to Mara. Feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are susceptible to Mara.
sn23.12:1.7: They understand: ‘… there is nothing further for this place.’”
